response.overview: A 'cult' classic for fans of the famous 'Nollywood' Nigerian Cinema. A Christian Pastor takes student pastors on an evangelical mission to a remote village in the wilderness where they think they will be preaching the Gospel of Jesus Christ but instead they are met wih death attacks and the revelation that their pastor is sacrificing them for a cult with a 'Big Foot' esque leader called Kubala.
response.title: 40 Days in the Wilderness
